title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. D, pt. 332 - Examination Of Disputed Psychology Bills
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. D, pt. 332

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 13-m, 117[1], 141; Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Benefit Law, §§ 16, 57, 58; Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law, §§ 16, 57, 58

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
